alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 9:55PM EST until February 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact travel starting Wednesday afternoon, persisting into Thursday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to snow from northwest to southeast on Wednesday. Some freezing rain and sleet could mix in at times. The heaviest snow will occur with the second round of precip Thursday into Thursday evening. with blowing and drifting snow and falling temperatures. Visibilities will be reduced Thursday and Thursday night, especially in rural areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
